title: Zeek - Network Protocols
description: - This dashboard gives insights into network protocols such as FTP, HTTP, NTP, RDP, SMTP, SMTP Links, SNMP, Socks, SSH, Tunnel, SSL, SMB Files, and SMB Mapping.

definition.content:
## Overview
- This dashboard gives insights into network protocols such as FTP, HTTP, NTP, RDP, SMTP, SMTP Links, SNMP, Socks, SSH, Tunnel, SSL, SMB Files, and SMB Mapping.

## Widgets
1. Avg File Size Being Transferred
2. Top 10 Commands
3. Files by Mime Type
4. FTP Session by Users
5. Top Reply Codes from Server
6. FTP Log Details
7. Total Uncompressed Content Size of the Data Transferred from the Client
8. HTTP Requests by Methods
9. Total Uncompressed Content Size of the Data Transferred from the Server
10. Top 10 Hosts
11. Top 10 Status Codes
12. Top 10 Requested URIs
13. HTTP Log Details
14. NTP versions
15. Top 10 NTP Modes
16. NTP stratum levels
17. NTP Log Details
18. Security Protocols
19. Top 10 Requested Channels by Client
20. Top 10 Client Machine Name
21. Top 10 Encryption Methods
22. RDP Log Details
23. Top 10 Email by Sender
24. Top 10 Email by Recipient
25. Top 10 Clients
26. SMTP Log Details
27. Top 10 Domain
28. SMTP Links Log Details
29. Timeline for SNMP Activities
30. SNMP Log Details
31. SOCKS Protocol Versions
32. Top 10 Login Requested Users
33. Requests by Address and Port
34. Server Bound Addresses with Port
35. Password Capture Count
36. Server Status Over Time
37. SOCKS Log Details
38. No. of Auth Attempts
39. Successful Authentications
40. Failed Authentications
41. Failed SSH Authentication Rate
42. SSH Versions
43. Authentication Directions
44. Top 10 Signing (MAC) Algorithm Used
45. Top 10 Compression Algorithm Used
46. Top 10 Encryption Algorithm Used
47. Top 10 Server Key Algorithm
48. Top 10 Key Exchange Algorithm Used
49. SSH Log Details
50. Successfully Established Sessions
51. TLS Versions
52. Top 10 TLS Version and Protocol Used
53. Top 10 Handshake Alerts
54. Top 10 Validation Messages
55. Top 10 SSL Packet Orders
56. Top 10 Requested Server Names
57. SSL Log Details
58. Avg size of File
59. Top 10 SMB Actions
60. Top 10 Clients
61. SMB Files Log Details
62. Top 10 Resource Types
63. Top 10 Clients
64. SMB Mapping Log Details

definition.title: Total Uncompressed Content Size of the Data Transferred from the Client
Total Uncompressed Content Size of the Data Transferred from the Server
Top 10 TLS Version and Protocol Used
